file(COPY  README inv_tr.cir inv_tr.cir.sh inv_tr_lev10.cir inv_tr_lev10.cir.tags inv_tr_lev57.cir inv_tr_lev57.cir.tags nmos3p2.mod nmos3p2_lev57.mod pmos3p2.mod pmos3p2_lev57.mod tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/inv_tr.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1788/inv_tr.cir.sh COMMAND ${BASH_BIN} inv_tr.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} inv_tr.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1788/inv_tr.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1788/inv_tr.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/inv_tr.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1788/inv_tr.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bug1788;issue328")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1788/inv_tr.cir.sh COMMAND ${BASH_BIN} inv_tr.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} inv_tr.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1788/inv_tr.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1788/inv_tr.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/inv_tr.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1788/inv_tr.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bug1788;issue328")
endif()
